name: 11 Plus Verbal Reasoning - Method and Technique - parents/pupils guide
description:
This book covers the methods and techniques that can be applied to over 20 types of the most frequently used verbal reasoning questions in the 11 Plus and other school entrance exams.

This book comes with 3 Dual Format eleven plus practice examination papers and complements the IPS sets of eleven plus practice papers.

Why buy several books on 11 plus technique when you really only need this one?

Includes HIKNOS questions.

Normal Price: £7.99

name: 11 Plus Verbal Reasoning - Daily Practice Tests 1
description:
This book contains 20 practice papers of 10 questions for the 11 Plus Verbal Reasoning exam.

It is hard to keep up the momentum of practice, especially during school breaks. Just a few minutes practise every day can be so very beneficial.

This eleven plus book comes in Dual Format  -  which means it is suitable for both Standard AND Multiple Choice versions of the 11 Plus entrance tests.

Includes HIKNOS questions.

Normal Price: £5.99

name: 11 Plus Verbal Reasoning - Set A - 10 shorter practice papers (DF)
description:
These Eleven Plus exam papers were especially designed for those in who take an NFER or similar 11 Plus test. The set contains 10 tests each of 50 questions. Each paper is designed to take 30 minutes and is ideal for practise at home where we realise it is difficult to keep your children on-task for much longer than this.

These eleven plus papers come in Dual Format - which means they are suitable for both Standard AND Multiple Choice 11 Plus grammar school entrance tests.

Includes HIKNOS questions.
